content: sections of garter row followed by sections of stockinette with an eyelet row running through the middle until you reach the end where we ll finish up with a section of eyelets and a bobble bind off the scarf increases at an asymmetrical rate resulting in an increase of two stitches over four row throughout the pattern this gives the scarf its characteristic vortex shape confetti scarf 2 designs by jennifer tipton 2019 pattern section instructions row 7 sl1-wyif k1 kfb k to end 1 stitch garter row section increased row 8 sl1-wyif k1 k3tog k to last 2 stitches kfb row 1 rs sl1-wyif k1 kfb k to end 1 stitch k1 1 stitch decreased increased row 2 ws sl1-wyif k to last 2 stitches kfb k1 1 stitch increased instructions row 3 sl1-wyif k1 kfb k to end 1 stitch cast on 6 stitches using the long tail cast on increased method follow the outline below following the appropriate section instructions for each section as row 4 sl1-wyif k1 k3tog k to last 2 stitches kfb you begin working your first garter row section k1 1 stitch decreased you may find it helpful to place a locking stitch marker on the right side of your work row 1 or 3 stockinette row section instructions work garter row 1-4 until you have 44 stitches on row 1 rs sl1-wyif k1 kfb k to end 1 stitch your needles ending on a row 4 increased work stockinette row 1-4 twice 48 stitches row 2 ws sl1-wyif p to last 2 stitches kfb k1 1 stitch increased work eyelet row 1-8 one time 52 stitches row 3 sl1-wyif k1 kfb k to end 1 stitch work stockinette row 1-4 twice 56 stitches increased row 4 sl1-wyif k1 k3tog p to last 2 stitches kfb work garter row 1-4 six times 68 stitches k1 1 stitch decreased work stockinette row 1-4 twice 72 stitches eyelet row section instructions work eyelet row 1-8 one time 76 stitches row 1 rs sl1-wyif k1 kfb k to end 1 stitch work stockinette row 1-4 twice 80 stitches increased row 2 ws sl1-wyif k to last 2 stitches kfb k1 work garter row 1-4 six times 92 stitches 1 stitch increased work stockinette row 1-4 twice 96 stitches row 3 sl1-wyif k1 kfb k to end 1 stitch increased work eyelet row 1-8 one time 100 stitches row 4 sl1-wyif k1 k3tog k to last 2 stitches kfb work stockinette row 1-4 twice 104 stitches k1 1 stitch decreased row 5 sl1-wyif k1 kfb *yo k2tog* repeat to last work garter row 1-4 six times 116 stitches 3 stitches k3 1 stitch increased work eyelet row 1-8 five times 136 stitches row 6 sl1-wyif k to last 2 stitches kfb k1 1 stitch increased confetti scarf 3 designs by jennifer tipton 2019 bobble bind off cast off the next stitch by knitting one stitch and then passing the second stitch from your right hand work row
